thread.title: Report: Deal Coming Soon Between Browns And Jamie Collins
thread.title_full: Report: Deal Coming Soon Between Browns And Jamie Collins

author: CBS Cleveland
title: Report: Deal Coming Soon Between Browns And Jamie Collins
text:
Report: Deal Coming Soon Between Browns And Jamie Collins January 19, 2017 9:46 PM CLEVELAND, OH - DECEMBER 11: Jamie Collins #51 of the Cleveland Browns tackles Rex Burkhead #33 of the Cincinnati Bengals at Cleveland Browns Stadium on December 11, 2016 in Cleveland, Ohio. (Photo by Justin K. Aller/Getty Images) 
CLEVELAND (AP) — The Cleveland Browns are close to a contract agreement with linebacker Jamie Collins. 
The sides have been in talks for several days and were nearing a deal on Thursday night. The Browns acquired Collins in a mid-season trade with the New England Patriots, giving up a third-round pick for the former Pro Bowler. 
CBSSports.com first reported the Browns and Collins were making progress on a contract extension 
Collins is eligible to become an unrestricted free agent in March, but the Browns want to sign the 27-year-old to a multi-year deal. He made an impact on Cleveland’s young defense and said he enjoyed playing with the Browns despite the team finishing with a 1-15 record.
